tool.name: Get data files list
tool.description: Get a collection of MetaboLights study data files filtered on factor values

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier.
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.

param.name: factor_name
param.label: Factor name to filter on.
param.help: Factor name relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. genotype. You can get a study's factor names by using the study_factors tool.

param.name: factor_value
param.label: Factor value to filter on.
param.help: Factor value relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. cyp79. You can get a study's factor values by using the study_factor_values tool.

tool.help:
======================================== Get a MetaboLights study data files list ========================================
This tool returns a list of data files sliced on a filtered factor name and value.
----- Input -----
MetaboLights Study Identifier ============================= MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.
Factor name to filter on ======================== Factor name relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. replicate. You can get the relevant factor names for a particular study by using the `study_factors` tool.
Factor value to filter on ========================= Factor value relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. Exp2. You can get the relevant factor values for a particular study and factor by using the `study_factor_values` tool.
------ Output ------
Collection of data files ======================== A collection of data files downloaded from MetaboLights, or if available, from the input ISA-Tab dataset.
